◆ Emoji() [2/5]

discpp::Emoji::Emoji ( const discpp::Guild &  guild,
const Snowflake &  id 
)

Constructs a discpp::Emoji object using a guild object and id.

This constructor searches the emoji cache in the guild object to get an emoji object.

discpp::Emoji emoji(guild, 657246994997444614);
Parameters
[in]guildThe guild that has this emoji.
[in]idThe id of the emoji.
Returns
discpp::Emoji, this is a constructor.

◆ ToString()

std::string discpp::Emoji::ToString ( )
inline

Gets a string representation of this emoji for sending through messages.

ctx.Send(emoji.ToString() + " Failed to make request!");
Returns
std::string

◆ ToURL()

std::string discpp::Emoji::ToURL ( )
inline

Gets a URL representation of this emoji for adding reactions.

This URI encodes the emoji and returns the string result.

std::string endpoint = Endpoint("/channels/%/messages/%/reactions/%/@me", channel.id, id, emoji);
Returns
std::string
